hudson.tasks.Shell.command: echo "Starting job" set +e echo __ROBOT_FILE__ > ${WORKSPACE}/executionFile.robot robot -d ${WORKSPACE}/output/ ${WORKSPACE}/executionFile.robot mkdir -p /var/www/html/__EXECUTION_ID__ robotmetrics --output output.xml --email false sudo rm output.xml sudo mv metrics*.html /var/www/html/__EXECUTION_ID__/index.html sudo mv report.html /var/www/html/__EXECUTION_ID__/report.html sudo mv log.html /var/www/html/__EXECUTION_ID__/log.html
